game.name: Run Quad Run
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Run Quad Run is a top-down skill based parkour game where you escape from the evil shapes to recover the lost artifacts of Cubicland. Navigate through various worlds with different enemies and master your reflex skills in the world of cubes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run Quad Run is a top-down skill based parkour game where you escape from the evil shapes to recover the lost artifacts of Cubicland. Navigate through various worlds with different enemies and master your reflex skills in the world of cubes.

reviewHighlights.text: Video Review: https://youtu.be/RZCg1P_TDdI?si=TqcvBA843C5E1C-O TL:DR: Run Quad Run is a fantastic game that is very unique. You play as a little squar...
Made my wife play this game and she rage quit hard XD 10/10
